abstract: Arkansas running back Alex Collins announces that he is skipping his senior year to enter 2016 NFL draft; other college football news noted.
snippet: Arkansas running back Alex Collins said he would skip his senior season and enter the N.F.L. draft, ending his college career with 3,703 rushing yards, the second most in program history.
lead_paragraph: Arkansas running back Alex Collins said he would skip his senior season and enter the N.F.L. draft, ending his college career with 3,703 rushing yards, the second most in program history.
